formalMetadata.description: Document containing a checkbox and a link; when the checkbox state changes the focus is moved to the link.
formalMetadata.title: Change of focus - checkbox onchange
formalMetadata.dc:creator: johannes.koch@fit.fraunhofer.de

recommendation.label: XHTML™ 1.0 The Extensible HyperText Markup Language (Second Edition)

purpose.p: The test is intended to fail because a change in checkbox state changes the focus.

userGuidance.p: Please make shure JavaScript is activated in your browser. This test has to be done without a computer mouse, even if it is available. So please use your keyboard only and navigate the page with the tab key. Select elements by pressing the space bar. Please select all listed fruits (apple, pear and banana).

questionText.p: Could you do the selection of the three elements in a straight forward manner?

optionOther.p: Please provide your comments in regard to possible difficulties with the selection of the three elements. Suggestions on improvements are welcome as well:
